亥の子餅: (いのこもち) - Day-of-the-Boar mochi (made with new grains)
亥年: (いのししどし) - year of the boar
亥月: (がいげつ) - tenth month of the lunar calendar
享く: (うく) - (v2k-s,vt)   to receive; to get; to be given
享ける: (うける) - to receive/to get; to catch (e.g. a ball); to be struck by (wind, waves, sunlight, etc.); to sustain (damage)/to incur (a loss)/to suffer (an injury)/to feel (influence); to undergo (e.g. surgery)/to take (a test)/to accept (a challenge); (esp. 受ける, 享ける) to be given (e.g. life, talent); (esp. 受ける, 享ける) to follow/to succeed/to be descended from; to face (south, etc.); (esp. 受ける, 承ける) to be modified by; (esp. 請ける, now primarily used in compound words)  to obtain (a pawned item, etc.) by paying a fee; to be well-received/to become popular/to go down well
享保の改革: (きょうほうのかいかく) - Kyouhou Reforms; economic reforms introduced in 1736
享保尺: (きょうほうじゃく) - Kyouhou shaku (approx. 30.36 cm)
享持: (きょうじ) - securing rights and profits
享楽主義: (きょうらくしゅぎ) - epicureanism; hedonism
享楽気分: (きょうらくきぶん) - (yoji) enjoyable (pleasant) feeling (atmosphere)
享楽生活: (きょうらくせいかつ) - (yoji) gay life
京: (kyou/kei) - capital , imperial capital (esp. Kyoto); final word of an iroha-uta; 10^16, 10,000,000,000,000,000, ten quadrillion
京ことば: (きょうことば) - Kyoto pronunciation; Kyoto dialect
京の水: (きょうのみず) - water from the capital (Kyoto), rumored to have a whitening effect; type of washing lotion from the end of the Edo period
京の着倒れ: (きょうのきだおれ) - financially ruining oneself by buying too many clothes (as a fabled tendency of the people of Kyoto)
京人: (けいじん) - citizen of the capital
京人形: (きょうにんぎょう) - Kyoto doll
京地: (きょうち) - former capital region (i.e. Kyoto and its environs)
京女鷸: (キョウジョシギ) - ruddy turnstone (species of sandpiper, Arenaria interpres)
京官: (けいかん) - public official stationed in the capital (under the ritsuryo system)
京形: (きょうがた) - style current in the capital
京方: (きょうがた) - the direction of Kyoto; Kansai area; citizens of Kyoto; nobles
京津: (けいしん) - Kyoto-Otsu/Kyoto and Otsu; Kyoto-Settsu/Kyoto and Settsu
京童: (きょうわらわ) - Kyoto's young people
京童部: (きょうわらわべ) - Kyoto's young people
京紫: (きょうむらさき) - somewhat reddish purple
京胡: (きょうこ) - jinghu (2-stringed Chinese instrument played with a bow)
京菜: (きょうな) - mizuna (Brassica rapa var. nipposinica); potherb mustard
京表: (きょうおもて) - vicinity of Kyoto
京言葉: (きょうことば) - Kyoto pronunciation; Kyoto dialect
京詞: (きょうことば) - Kyoto pronunciation; Kyoto dialect
京都の産: (きょうとのさん) - native of Kyoto
京都五山: (きょうとござん) - Kyoto Gozan; the five most important Rinzai temples of Kyoto, as well as Nanzen-ji
京都府警: (きょうとふけい) - Kyoto Prefectural Police
京都議定書: (きょうとぎていしょ) - Kyoto Protocol
京間: (きょうま) - standard measurement for the distance between pillars in the Kansai area (approx. 197 cm); Kyoto-size tatami mat (approx. 190 cm by 95 cm)
京阪式アクセント: (けいはんしきアクセント) - Keihan-style accent; Kyoto-Osaka accent
京響: (きょうきょう) - Kyoto Symphony Orchestra
京風: (きょうふう) - Kyoto style; urbanity; refinement
亭: (tei) - pavilhão, glorieta, alpendre, pérgula, pavilhão; sufixo que forma a parte final dos pseudônimos de alguns escritores e artistas; sufixo que forma a parte final do nome de um restaurante
亭主: (teishu) - household head, master, host (ex. de um encontro para chá), innkeeper, owner (e.g. of an hotel); husband
亭主の好きな赤烏帽子: (ていしゅのすきなあかえぼし) - Family members should fall into line with the head of the family even if his taste is a little odd, like wearing a red eboshi, which is ordinarily black
亭主関白: (teishukanpaku) - marido autoritário, marido dominador, marido que manda em tudo
亮察: (りょうさつ) - consideration; taking into account; sympathy with
亮闇: (りょうあん) - court mourning (for the late emperor or empress); national mourning
人: (jin/nin/hito) - pessoa, -ian (por exemplo, italiano), -ite (por exemplo, Tokyoite); -er (por exemplo, performer, etc.), pessoa que trabalha com ...; homem, pessoa, pessoas
人々: (にんにん) - each person; people; men and women; everybody
人いきれ: (ひといきれ) - body heat from several people in close quarters; stuffy air
人かげ: (ひとかげ) - figure of a person/figures of people; shadow of a person
人がいい: (ひとがいい) - generous; soft-hearted; having a good personality
人が好い: (ひとがいい) - generous; soft-hearted; having a good personality
人が群れる: (ひとがむれる) - to be crowded with people
人け: (ひとけ) - (often 人気(が,の)ない - deserted) sign of life/human presence; humanity/humaneness
人ごと: (ひとごと) - other people's affairs; somebody else's problem
